actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: Joint resolution to provide for extension of flexible authority relating to payment of interest on time and savings deposits.

summary.text: Provides for the extension to August 1, 1974, of the authority of the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System to regulate the payment of interest on time and savings deposits. (Amends 12 U.S.C. 461nt)

titles.title: Joint resolution to provide for extension of flexible authority relating to payment of interest on time and savings deposits.
